listitem.para: November 2nd, 2014
[krejzi] - .
[krejzi] - Updated to sound-juicer-3.14.0.
[krejzi] - Updated to baobab-3.14.1, empathy-3.12.7 and nautilus-sendto-3.8.2.
November 1st, 2014
[krejzi] - Updated to seahorse-3.14.0 and totem-3.14.0.
[krejzi] - Updated to gnome-terminal-3.14.1, gucharmap-3.14.1 and notification-daemon--3.14.0.
[krejzi] - Updated to evolution-3.12.7, file-roller-3.14.1, gedit-3.14.0 and gnome-calculator-3.14.1.
[krejzi] - Updated to brasero-3.11.4, cheese-3.14.1, eog-3.14.1, epiphany-3.14.1 and evince-3.14.1.
[krejzi] - Merged sbc-1.3 update from trunk. Thanks to Bruce for doing all the work.
[krejzi] - Merged sudo-1.8.11p2 and menu-cache-1.0.0 updates from trunk. Thanks to Fernando for doing all the work.
[krejzi] - Updated to adwaita-icon-theme-3.14.1, gnome-session-3.14.0, gdm-3.14.1, gnome-user-docs-3.14.1 and yelp-3.14.1.
October 31st, 2014
[krejzi] - Merged gdb-7.8.1, git-2.1.3 and sqlite-3.8.7.1 updates from trunk. Thanks to Fernando for doing all the work.
[krejzi] - Removed Build Order page from GNOME section as the desktop packages are already sorted in the recommended build order.
October 30th, 2014
[krejzi] - Updated to mutter-3.14.1.5, gnome-shell-3.14.1.5 and gnome-shell-extensions-3.14.1.
[krejzi] - Updated to libreoffice-4.3.3.
[krejzi] - Updated to gnome-settings-daemon-3.14.0 and gnome-control-center-3.14.0.
[krejzi] - Updated to gnome-bluetooth-3.14.0 and gnome-keyring-3.14.0.
[krejzi] - Updated to gnome-themes-standard-3.14.0, gvfs-1.22.1, nautilus-3.14.0 and zenity-3.14.0.
[krejzi] - Updated to caribou-0.4.15, dconf-0.22.0 and gnome-backgrounds-3.14.1.
[krejzi] - Merged ruby-2.1.4, dhcpcd-6.6.0 and wget-1.16 updates from trunk. Thanks to Fernando for doing all the work.
[krejzi] - Merged liblinear-1.95 and pinentry-0.9.0 updates from trunk. Thanks to Fernando for doing all the work.
October 29th, 2014
[krejzi] - Updated to gnome-online-miners-3.14.0.
[krejzi] - Updated to evolution-data-server-3.12.7.1 and folks-0.10.0.
[krejzi] - Updated to gnome-online-accounts-3.14.1 and libgdata-0.16.0.
[krejzi] - Updated to libpeas-1.12.1, librest-0.7.92 and libwnck-3.4.9.
[krejzi] - Updated to libchamplain-0.12.9, libgee-0.16.1 and libgweather-3.14.1.
[krejzi] - Updated to gnome-menus-3.13.3, gtkhtml-4.8.5 and gtksourceview-3.14.1.
[krejzi] - Updated to gcr-3.14.0, geocode-glib-3.14.0, gjs-1.42.0 and gnome-desktop-3.14.0.
[krejzi] - Updated to totem-pl-parser-3.10.3, tracker-1.2.3, vte-0.38.1 and yelp-xsl-3.14.0.
[krejzi] - Updated to accountsservice-0.6.39 and gsettings-desktop-schemas-3.14.1.
[krejzi] - Changed CUPS, CUPS-Filters and Gutenprint instructions to work on systemd setups.
[krejzi] - Changed ALSA-Utils instructions to work on systemd setups.
[krejzi] - Changed Transmission instructions to use rewritten Qt instructions.
[krejzi] - Added adwaita-icon-theme-3.14.0, farstream-0.2.6 and sound-theme-freedesktop-0.8.
[krejzi] - Imported GNOME 3.12 from systemd branch revision 14805.
[krejzi] - Updated to firefox-33.0.2.
October 28th, 2014
[krejzi] - Changed LXDE-Common instructions to work on systemd setups.
[krejzi] - Temporarily removed LXDM.
[krejzi] - Changed Xfce4-Session instructions to work on systemd setups.
[krejzi] - Changed KDE-Workspace and "Starting KDE" instructions to work on systemd setups.
[krejzi] - Internal refactoring of the WebKitGTK+-2.6.2 instructions.
October 27th, 2014
[krejzi] - Simplified WebKitGTK-2.4.7 instructions.
[krejzi] - Rewrote Qt4 and Qt5 instructions to use qtchooser.
[krejzi] - Added colord-gtk-0.2.25 and gtk-vnc-0.5.3.
[krejzi] - Changed Cairo, Cogl, Clutter and GTK+ 3 instructions to work on Wayland setups.
October 26th, 2014
[krejzi] - Changed MesaLib, XKeyboard-Config, Xorg-Server, Xorg Wacom Driver and Xorg VMWare Driver instructions to work on systemd setups.
[krejzi] - Added libva-vdpau-driver-0.7.4.
[krejzi] - Moved libva, libva-intel-driver, libvdpau and libvdpau-va-gl to Multimedia section.
[krejzi] - Changed Apache, Bind9, ProFTPD, vsFTPD, OpenLDAP, Unbound and Xinetd instructions to work on systemd setups.
[krejzi] - Changed MariaDB, PostgreSQL, Dovecot, Exim, Postfix and Sendmail instructions to work on systemd setups.
[krejzi] - Fixed w3m linking with an image library.
[krejzi] - Changed and simplified Wireshark instructions so they use qtchooser in case of two Qt installations.
[krejzi] - Changed Avahi, NetworkManager and Wicd instructions to work on systemd setups.
[krejzi] - Removed netfs instructions.
[krejzi] - Changed CIFS-Utils, NFS-Utils, NTP, rpcbind. RSync, Samba and WPA_Supplicant instructions to work on systemd setups.
[krejzi] - Added geoclue-2.1.10, libnice-0.1.8 and uhttpmock-0.3.1.
[krejzi] - Removed initd-tools.
[krejzi] - Changed Acpid, At, AutoFS, BlueZ, Colord, FCron, GPM, Sysstat, UDisks and UDisks2 instructions to work on systemd setups.
[krejzi] - Added cups-pk-helper-0.2.5, ModemManager-1.4.0 and weston-1.6.0.
[krejzi] - Updated to upower-0.99.1.
[krejzi] - Improved and simplified Subversion instructions.
[krejzi] - Changed PHP and SVN Server instructions to work on systemd setups.
[krejzi] - Added Jinja2-2.7.3, MarkupSafe-0.23, pyatspi-2.14.0, setuptools-7.0 and PyYAML-3.11 - Python Modules.
[krejzi] - Changed and simplified CMake and Poppler instructions so they use qtchooser in case of two Qt installations.
[krejzi] - Improved and expanded libwebp instructions.
[krejzi] - Added libmediaart-0.7.0.
[krejzi] - Added bogofilter-1.2.4, highlight-3.19, ibus-1.5.9 and qtchooser-39.
[krejzi] - Updated to appstream-glib-0.3.1.
[krejzi] - Moved appstream-glib to General Libraries section.
[krejzi] - Added libinput-0.6.0, libmbim-1.10.0, liboauth-1.0.3, libpwquality-1.2.4, libqmi-1.10.4, libxbkcommon-0.5.0, wayland-1.6.0 and yaml-0.1.6.
[krejzi] - Moved libevdev to General Libraries section.
[krejzi] - Updated to xapian-core-1.2.19.
[krejzi] - Changed libgcrypt and libgpg-error instructions so systemd can safely be linked against them.
[krejzi] - Changed Cyrus-SASL, Firewalling, Haveged, Iptables, MIT Kerberos V5, OpenSSH and Stunnel instructions to work on systemd setups.
[krejzi] - Changed Polkit instructions to use systemd-logind.
[krejzi] - Removed ConsoleKit and Udev-Extras pages.
[krejzi] - Imported systemd specific D-Bus and post LFS systemd instructions.
[krejzi] - Improved and simplified the GnuPG instructions.
[krejzi] - Rewrote libcap instructions to only install the PAM module.
[krejzi] - Changed ISC DHCP and DHCPCD instructions to work on systemd setups.
[krejzi] - Adjusted Qemu instructions to use the "Advanced Network Configuration" instead of bridge-utils.
[krejzi] - Stripped configuration paragraph from bridge-utils instructions in favor of systemd-networkd ones.
[krejzi] - Imported "Advanced Network Configuration" instructions for configuring the Network Bridge with systemd-networkd.
[krejzi] - Removed random instructions.
[krejzi] - Adjusted Postlfs Configuration for use with LFS systemd.
[krejzi] - Imported systemd-units from main systemd branch.
[krejzi] - Rebranded the book into systemd-ng book.
[krejzi] - Imported BLFS revision 14732.
